title: Mexico
description: Mexico is a bright country full of surprises. It's known for its rich culture, ancient ruins, and dazzling beaches. I enjoyed an opportunity to learn Spanish, to get my belly button piercing, and to finally be reunited with my husband-to-be.

title: Colombia
description: Colombia was the next country on our way. I was very excited to come here because I've never imagined myself here. I also just watched Encanto... So it's not a surprize that I wanted to go here so badly and to see everything with my own eyes.

title: Arizona
description: I've never been to the US... I actually don't think I've ever wanted to go there. So I don't know what to wait from this country. It's magical in the pictures. Arizona sounds like a place with an arid and hot climate, stunning landscapes which remind me of Mars, and unbelievable art. We'll see...
